snippet.title: Friday Night Funkin' - Perfect Combo - ANTIPATHY Mod (Demo) [F*CKED]
snippet.description:
Absolutely in love with this mod, oh my GOD. Seriously one of, if not the coolest Hank mod I've ever played, everything about it was absolutely incredible!! My god the entire mod's artstyle and Hank himself just look stunning, I love how unique it looks so much! I seriously can't get enough of how this mod looks. And the songs, my GOD, especially Battered! They all sound so incredible and fit in with the Madness of it all so damn well, the voice acted portions were so damn cool too, I love Hank's voice it sounds super cool! The charts were really damn fun too, not the best accuracy I've gotten, but hey at least I got through it! I seriously can't express how much I love this mod, I am incredibly hyped for the final version to come out, can't wait to see how it looks! Hope you guys enjoy!

Link to mod: https://gamejolt.com/games/fnfantipathy/643559



0:00 - Battered
2:14 - Overdrive

Join this FNF Leaderboards Discord if you want to see actually good players! https://discord.gg/pSnB7ExjEp

Support the developers!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/funkin/friday-night-funkin-the-full-ass-game/
https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin ‎
‎
‎ ‎
‎
‎
Channel Info:
This channel consists of videos about modifications to a rhythmic video game (some of which I personally worked on) that range from slightly difficult to very hard for most players. Four arrows fly towards the screen forcing you to press them at the right time to the music. Hitting all the arrows in a song counts as a "Full Combo", which is very hard to do and takes a lot of time and practice to be able to do consistently and is the main gimmick of my channel, which I showcase in each video. I also include secrets and extra content that might’ve been undiscovered and show them off through instructional and entertaining ways that can be used as guides, as well as occasionally adding my own input on things happening in the video, all done through my creative editing style that focuses on being concise and transformative. In the descriptions I give my in-depth opinion on the video game as well as timestamps for each part of the video. All the videos were played, recorded and edited by me. #FridayNightFunkin #FNF #Flippy
